data.description: Need: 1) Backlog as entity or sprint-like container 2) Priority sorting within backlog 3) Promotion from backlog to sprint 4) Backlog review workflow

properties.retrospective: Implemented backlog management CLI: got backlog list (with priority sorting), got backlog promote (move to sprint), got backlog review (get suggestions), got backlog stats. Enhanced orphan list with priority sorting and status filtering.

data.title: Implement backlog management system
